data.name: Project Echoes
data.detailed_description:
Project Echoes is a 2.5D Action Platformer.

Play as the guardian Specter and his flying companion Mip as they protect the innocent creatures of the forest from the invading evil spirits known as the Dark Wisps, a group of ghostly apparitions who cause harm to the innocent creatures of the forest.

Key Features:
  • Journey across an interconnected world as you fight your way against hordes of Ghostly Apparitions.
  • Switch between melee and ranged attacks as Specter and Mip. Slice your enemies as Specter & shoot enemies from a distance as Mip.
  • Upgrade your weapons and purchase new abilities from the Merchant.
  • Face hordes of Ghostly enemies and bosses.
  • Full support for gamepad, & mouse + keyboard.

data.short_description: Save the once peaceful land in Project Echoes. Explore an interconnected world overrun by evil ghostly apparitions. Slash and shoot your enemies as two heroes each with their own unique abilities in this action adventure platformer.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E5200
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Intel, 3.3 GHz (AMD FX 8300, Intel i5 3000)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD or Intel, 4 GHz (AMD Ryzen 5 3600, Intel i5 8600)
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
